definitions: Removes all coverings or clothes from someone or something.
Removes a component or accessory from something.
Divests of property, rights, or privileges.
Removes paint, varnish, or other coating from a surface.
Damages the thread of a screw or bolt.
Pulls off the leaves or branches from a plant.
examples: He strips the bed every week.
The machine strips the wires automatically.
The company strips its employees of benefits.
She strips the old paint from the furniture.
The deer strips the bark from the trees.
